title: FF! Doc | SignaturePipe
listItems: PEM Currently only used by the SignaturePipe to use a PEM certificate directly as a truststore.
Required Support a current transaction; create a new one if none exists.
Supports Support a current transaction; execute non-transactionally if none exists.
Mandatory Support a current transaction; throw an exception if no current transaction exists.
RequiresNew Create a new transaction, suspending the current transaction if one exists.
NotSupported Do not support a current transaction; rather always execute non-transactionally.
Never Do not support a current transaction; throw an exception if a current transaction exists.

SignaturePipe
PipesTranslator
See also
Github - SignaturePipe Implementation Examples
Javadoc - org.frankframework.pipes.SignaturePipe
Syntax
Copy
<SignaturePipe name="" keystore=""/>
Attributes
Required
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
keystore	text	-
Keystore to obtain signing key
name	text	-
The functional name of this pipe. It can be referenced by the path attribute of a PipeForward.
Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
action	options	SIGN
Action to be taken when pipe is executed.
Available Options:
SIGN signs the input
VERIFY verifies a signature

algorithm	text	ALGORITHM_DEFAULT
The signing algorithm
provider	text	-
Cryptography provider
signatureBase64	boolean	true
If true, the signature is (expected to be) base64 encoded
keystoreType	options	pkcs12
Type of keystore, can be pkcs12 or pem
Available Options:
PEM Currently only used by the SignaturePipe to use
